shop.title: ACTIVE NOISE CANCELING

aboutBanner.title: About Our Journey

items.question: Which credit cards do you accept?
items.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover cards for all purchases.

items.question: What courier do you use for deliveries?
items.answer: We partner with multiple courier services including FedEx, UPS, and DHL to ensure reliable delivery.

items.question: How long my packet come?
items.answer: Delivery times typically range from 3-5 business days for domestic shipping and 7-14 days for international shipping.

items.question: How long will it be before I get a refund?
items.answer: Refunds are typically processed within 3-5 business days after we receive your return.
